original_text: Yet the number of the children of Israel shall be as the sand of the sea, which cannot be measured nor numbered; and it shall come to pass, that in the place where it was said unto them, Ye are not my people, there it shall be said unto them, Ye are the sons of the living God.
korean_text: 그러나 이스라엘 자손의 수가 바닷가의 모래 같이 되어서 헤아릴 수도 없고 셀 수도 없을 것이며 전에 그들에게 이르기를 너희는 내 백성이 아니라 한 그 곳에서 그들에게 이르기를 너희는 살아 계신 하나님의 아들들이라 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Yet the number of the children of Israel
shall be as the sand of the sea
which cannot be measured nor numbered
and it shall come to pass
that in the place where it was said unto them
there it shall be said unto them
Ye are the sons of the living God
